name: CardDunTris
description:
CardDunTris
The Card-based tetris dungeon crawler

Ready for the most epic adventure?

Build your tower with dungeon rooms falling from above!
Battle dragons using the best sequence of cards! (Whoever has the most life at the end of a round wins)
Find treasures to unlock new cards!

Can you rescue the princess before you are defeated?

Coded in Godot with the help of my daughters Jolene (14) who did the art and initial game concept, and Carena (11) who helped select music and sound.

Please leave a rating/comment on the Ludum Dare if you enjoy it.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/cardduntris
